code:
/*
    该文件用于汇总所有的reducer为一个总的reducer
*/ //引入combineReducers,用于汇总多个reducers
import{combineReducers}from'redux';//引入为Count组件服务的reducer
import countReducer from"./count";//引入为person组件服务的reducer
import personReducer from'./person';//汇总所有的reducer，整合为一个总的reducer对象
export default combineReducers({count:countReducer,persons:personReducer});
